EmailTemplate.description: Use this if a customer asks for status on a part already shipped to their Freight Forwarder
EmailTemplate.name: Shipment sent to Freight Forwarder
EmailTemplate.subject: Shipment status {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell. We have researched your order and have the following shipment details.
Your shipment is either picked up by, in transit to, or delivered to your designated freight forwarder. Here are the tracking details if your order items were shipped to your forwarder.
Carrier: <Enter Carrier Name> Air Waybill: <Enter AWB #>
Honeywell is unable to provide any shipping detail once the shipment is dispatched to your forwarder. Please contact your forwarder directly for further details about your shipment.
At this time, we are going to close out this request. Please do not hesitate to contact us for any future inquiries.
Thank you and best regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
